definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Who is this son of Jesse?
The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
sentences.chinese: 耶西的兒子大衛的祈禱完畢。

sentences.english: Fill your horn with oil and be on your way; I am sending you to Jesse of Bethlehem.
sentences.chinese: 你將膏油盛滿了角，我差遣你往伯利恆人耶西那裏去。

sentences.english: Now David was the son of an Ephrathite named Jesse, who was from Bethlehem in Judah.
sentences.chinese: 大衛是猶大，伯利恆的以法他人耶西的兒子。
但笨笨和耶西哪去了呢？

sentences.english: The sons of Uzziel: Micah the first and Isshiah the second.
sentences.chinese: 烏薛的長子是米迦，次子是耶西雅。

sentences.english: Will the son of Jesse give all of you fields and vineyards?
sentences.chinese: 耶西的兒子能將田地和葡萄園賜給你們各人嗎？

sentences.english: Then he consecrated Jesse and his sons and invited them to the sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 撒母耳就使耶西和他衆子自潔，請他們來喫祭肉。

sentences.english: For as long as the son of Jesse liveth upon the ground, thou shalt not be established, nor thy kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 耶西的兒子若在世間活着，你和你的國位必站立不住。
耶西，請站起來打開窗戶吧。

sentences.english: This concludes the prayers of David son of Jesse.
sentences.chinese: 耶西的兒子大衛的祈禱完畢。

sentences.english: We are with you, O son of Jesse!
sentences.chinese: 耶西的兒子阿，我們是幫助你的。

sentences.english: Jesse, stand up , please .Open the window .
sentences.chinese: 耶西，請站起來打開窗戶。

sentences.english: Look, Jesse. This is my new camera.
sentences.chinese: 耶西，看，這是我的新照相機。

sentences.english: There he would find the one God had chosen.
sentences.chinese: 他就在耶西的家找到神所揀選的人。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Josiah or Yoshiyahu (649-609 BC), a king of Judah (Judaism)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Gideon (name, from Judges 6:11-ffoll.)/also written 吉迪恩
